TopicTitle: Live space, Play space, Eat space

Articles.Content:
Current Space Engineering Student reporting in!

This game is the biggest distraction from my studies I could ever see.

Well, I\'ve come here for mods, challenges, and to share some videos. I\'m not sure if I should post them here, or in the showing off your creations section.

If you happen to have over9000 years though, you could watch the lets play video I did for an idea of how I do things.

I\'ve also got two short flight videos on other things I made I\'m quite pleased with. I have gone to the mun, minmus, and all that, but making simple rockets just isn\'t as much fun, is it?

so, hello!

Welcome to the forums!

I don\'t suppose you could do anything about the audio mixing with the video? (eg: turning up the vocal commentary, but turning down the engine noise) >_>

Also, nice use of Holst.

Welcome to the forums!

I don\'t suppose you could do anything about the audio mixing with the video? (eg: turning up the vocal commentary, but turning down the engine noise) >_>

Also, nice use of Holst.

Not any more sadly, but I have turned down the sound in KSP for next time I can be bothered to do running commentaries. I don\'t really like doing the spoken stuff so much though anyway, so its usually onscreen text.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
